Microplastics
Richard Thompson jiri okwu a bu "microplastics" mee ihe na 2004 ka ọ kọwara microplastics ka ọ bụrụ obere iberibe rọba, kpọmkwem ihe na-erughị 5 mm, nke a na-ahụ n'oké osimiri na akụkụ mmiri ndị ọzọ
Mgbe Thompson chepụtachara okwu ahụ bụ "microplastics", ọtụtụ ndị ọkà mmụta sayensị emeela nyocha iji gbalịa chọpụta mmetụta microplastics nwere n'oké osimiri.
